Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery vessel, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and remains of one line of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (56380) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/56380)
Almásy-Martin 2020 / Demotic, Greek and Coptic ostraca from Abydos in the British Museum (no.7)
Additional IDs: Miscellaneous number: O.BM Abydos Dem. 7 (Edition abbreviation according to Oates et al. 2001)
